Package utilities

Class ConvertTime

java.lang.Object
utilities.ConvertTime
public class ConvertTime extends Object
This is the ConvertTime class which is used to change times and dates accordingly throughout the application. This class holds the methods for adjusting and formatting times from local time to EST/UTC.

      Converts local time to EST.
      Parameters:

    • isApptWithinBusinessHrs

      public static boolean isApptWithinBusinessHrs(LocalDateTime localDateTime)
      Compares local time to EST business hours(8AM-10PM). If the time is between 8AM-10PM, true. If the time is not during business hours(8AM-10PM), false.
      Parameters:
      localDateTime - The local time to compare to EST.
      Returns:
      true or false, if time is between 8AM-10PM or not.
